main event: Two youths reported seeing a fast traveling flying disc over Ludington, Michigan on 21 April 1949.
interesting points: The disc appeared white and was described as looking like a comet with a tail a block long., The object was seen traveling west and disappeared over Lake Michigan., The sighting included a trail of bluish smoke, suggesting high speeds., The observers noted that the object was about 100 feet in diameter and reflective in the moonlight., Another witness received a postcard from an unknown woman claiming to have seen similar objects.
witness description: two youths, sophomores in Ludington High School
